tweet: As your Representative, it’s important that I hear from you on the issues that matter to you and your family. Please take a few moments and make your voice heard by taking my November survey. https://allred.house.gov/32nd-district-texas-november-survey …

Small businesses are the backbone of our North Texas economy, creating jobs and opportunity for people across our region. This #SmallBusinessSaturday, take time to support a small business in #TX32! pic.twitter.com/vGi33fCJ3P

I am so thankful for our men and women in uniform, and the many selfless sacrifices they make in service to our nation. I was honored to travel with my Veterans’ Affairs Committee colleagues to spend Thanksgiving with service-members currently overseas. pic.twitter.com/h1uvuGKCS6

Aly and I would like to wish North Texas a #HappyThanksgiving! I am thankful to serve #TX32 in Congress and grateful for the sacrifices of our brave men and women in uniform who cannot be with their families today. I hope your holiday is filled with loved ones, rest, and food! pic.twitter.com/JmPj5ViVMn

North Texans deserve the benefits they're owed, whether it's Medicare, Social Security or the VA. Recently, I was able to help James from Garland get his Social Security benefits reinstated after an injury at work. If you need assistance call 972-972-7949. https://allred.house.gov/casework-success/james-garland …

North Texas seniors should be aware of all the costs when shopping for a Medicare prescription plan. Be sure to pick a plan that works for you and your budget. Seniors have until Dec. 7 to pick or switch their prescription drug plan. https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2019/11/21/medicare-prescription-plan-finder-steers-seniors-higher-costs/4264696002/ …

About 1 in 5 Texans are living with arthritis, and many experience severe joint pain because of it. I'm fighting in Congress to #LowerDrugCosts so those with arthritis can afford the medications that help manage their pain and live a full & healthy life.  https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-releases-report-how-lower-drug-costs-now-act-will-deliver-relief-north … pic.twitter.com/JumNtNyc7Y

Listening to you is one of the most important parts of my job. Please take my survey so that I know what issues are most important to you and your family.
 https://allred.house.gov/32nd-district-texas-november-survey …

1.5 million Texans have asthma, and I am championing a bill that can lower the cost of asthma medication and other prescription drugs across the board. Let’s get something done this year to #LowerDrugCosts for North Texans! #ForThePeople  https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-releases-report-how-lower-drug-costs-now-act-will-deliver-relief-north … pic.twitter.com/SqAMrGZ6ko

Student parents, and soon to be parents, are often juggling a lot while starting a family. That's why I introduced a bill that will make it easier for students to find info regarding leave policies and child care from their institution of higher learning. https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-introduces-bill-bolster-outreach-child-care-and-leave-higher-ed …

Those who work in health care and social services provide care to some of our most vulnerable, but sadly, they're more likely to face violence at work. That's why I supported a bill to protect these caregivers + create a safety standard so no one feels unsafe at their workplace. pic.twitter.com/T1rQNfeJzM

Every North Texan should feel safe in their home. On the Transportation Committee I voted for common-sense pipeline safety rules that hold bad actors accountable, and work to prevent tragedies like the deadly gas explosions that occurred in our region. https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-supports-bill-pipeline-safety-transportation-committee …

For North Texans looking to #GetCovered and find a health insurance plan that works for you and your family, please visit  http://healthcare.gov .

According to @dallasnews, almost 90% of Texans got some financial help with their plan. Sign up today! https://www.dallasnews.com/business/commentary/2019/11/19/obamacare-2020-has-more-offers-and-lower-rates-even-in-texas/ …

Today is Transgender Day of Remembrance, a day to remember those who lost their lives due to bigotry and recognize the resilience of our transgender community. Let's all work towards a safer, more tolerant world where no one is subjected to violence based on who they are. #TDOR pic.twitter.com/8c228b2Zzh

My office is here as a resource to North Texans impacted by the recent tornado. Read this @phollowpeople story for more details on how to get help from the SBA or call my office at 972-972-7949.
 https://www.prestonhollowpeople.com/2019/11/15/sba-disaster-declaration-clears-way-for-federal-loan-relief/ …

I'm fighting to ensure Texas gets its share of federal transportation funds. My bipartisan bill, which passed the House today, will prevent $960 million in cuts and helps remove hurdles that were creating uncertainty for our local transportation agencies. https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-bill-prevents-960-million-cuts-texas-federal-transportation-funds …

As someone who was born and raised in #TX32, I know that it’s critical our local leaders work hand in hand with federal partners. Thank you, @DallasMayor Johnson, for stopping by our office to discuss how we can work together to help the people of Dallas. pic.twitter.com/i6kuZvehTR

November is #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth -- a time to celebrate and honor the rich culture of the indigenous communities across the U.S. and recognize their incredible contributions to our country. pic.twitter.com/014hM3o9zL

As the number of Texans diagnosed with diabetes increases, we need to find solutions to make treatment more affordable. That's why I'm working in Congress to lower the cost of insulin so those with diabetes can afford the life-saving medication they need. https://healthcare.dmagazine.com/2019/11/14/how-much-does-it-cost-to-treat-diabetes-in-texas/ …

As the son of a DISD teacher, I know firsthand the impact teachers can make on students' lives. Congrats to Susan Moreno of J.L. Long Middle School on winning this prestigious award for your dedication to helping our students reach their full potential. https://www.dallasnews.com/news/education/2019/11/14/meet-a-dallas-teacher-who-takes-a-bow-as-she-earns-the-oscar-of-education-and-25000/ …

Helping Texas businesses succeed in the global economy is critical. That’s why I voted in support of the @EximBankUS, which will ensure U.S. businesses get the support they need to compete with exporters across the globe while creating jobs at home. pic.twitter.com/GYeYhKL7OW

.@SBADFW is offering assistance to North Texas businesses & residents affected by the Oct. 20 storm. 

As our community recovers, it's important North Texans know all the resources available and they can call my office at 972-972-7949 for info & resources. https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-sba-offers-disaster-assistance-north-texas-businesses-and-residents …

Thank you @JudgeClayJ for all you are doing during the recovery process. My office is available to do everything we can to assist in all the efforts to help our community.

North Texans can always call my office for information and resources at (972) 972-7949. https://twitter.com/JudgeClayJ/status/1195020536977534978 …

Everywhere I go in North Texas I hear stories like this about how families struggle to afford the high cost of insulin and prescription drugs. Thank you @repdianadegette for sharing your family's story. Let's work together to #LowerDrugCosts across the board! #WorldDiabetesDay https://twitter.com/RepDianaDeGette/status/1194989312808497153 …

North Texas: Open enrollment for 2020 health care plans is underway. If you need help choosing a health care plan that fits you and your family's needs, visit one of these enrollment locations to #GetCovered. You can also go to  https://www.healthcare.gov  to explore your options. pic.twitter.com/H7WFQ7PNvS

Read the full report and learn about how I’m fighting to pass the Lower Drug Costs Now Act to help lower prices across the board: https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-releases-report-how-lower-drug-costs-now-act-will-deliver-relief-north …

Today, I released a report showing how #HR3 would lower prescription drug costs for North Texans - from those battling cancer to the young professional grappling w/ insulin costs to the senior on Medicare with arthritis to the single mom paying for asthma medicine. #ForthePeople pic.twitter.com/uCoTXtdIkm

Interested in learning about working in Congress? My Richardson and Washington, D.C. offices are currently accepting applications for my spring intern and fellows program. If you are interested, please apply at  http://allred.house.gov/internship  for more info. pic.twitter.com/mS1e361uXO

As a new dad, I know how important it is that new parents get access to the services they need, and this is especially true for veteran parents. 

Learn more about my bipartisan bill here: https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-bill-close-coverage-gap-emergency-transportation-services-passes-house …

The House took bipartisan action today for our veterans and passed my bill that helps veteran parents and their babies get emergency transportation costs covered by the VA. 

This bill is an important step toward helping veteran parents and closes an unnecessary gap in coverage. pic.twitter.com/al884EqW7n

Our veterans have made incredible sacrifices serving our country, and it's an honor to work for them in Congress.  I'm grateful to the veterans who shared their experiences and stories of bravery at my Veterans Town Hall last night. On behalf of #TX32, thank you for your service. pic.twitter.com/hGYxacPQ0L

I am live now at my #VeteransDay Town Hall in Dallas. Watch as we hear from North Texas veterans and I give an update on my work in Congress as a member of the Veterans’ Affairs Committee:  https://www.facebook.com/RepColinAllred/videos/729114427590927?vh=e&d=n&sfns=mo … #TX32

I was glad to join local leaders, members of the military and veterans today at the Greater Dallas #VeteransDay Parade to commemorate the 75th Anniversary of the Normandy Invasion. It was a privilege to attend, and show thanks to our North Texas veterans for their service. pic.twitter.com/zosnSqScMJ

I was honored to join folks at the Garland Senior Activity Center today for #VeteransDay to discuss how we can uphold our commitment to North Texas veterans, and bring a new VA health facility to Garland. pic.twitter.com/bRMaGPwUYo

Happy #VeteransDay to all of the veterans and military families in North Texas! Today we honor the brave men and women who have put so much on the line to defend our freedom. Our nation is eternally grateful for your sacrifice. pic.twitter.com/8cXSnVZCoK

Reminder: I am hosting a Veterans Day Town Hall on Monday, November 11. Veterans and military families are invited to share their stories and hear from the veterans in our community. Today we celebrate @USMC in honor of 244 years. Thank you to all the Marines past and present for your service to our great nation. #SemperFi pic.twitter.com/zjiWY7wB20

It’s unacceptable that in our country, 1 out of 4 people are rationing their insulin because they are struggling w/ high costs. That's why I'm leading a bipartisan bill to reduce insulin costs & make sure no one has to go without this life-saving medicine. https://bit.ly/2WYMwYh

Working to honor our commitment to all North Texas veterans is a top priority. Thanks to the Garland NAACP for inviting me to their Veterans Forum to meet with folks and share the work I’m doing as a member of the Veterans Committee, including bringing a VA clinic to Garland. pic.twitter.com/ywKkBS2YvH

My office is available to help veterans in North Texas with all kinds of issues they face. If you or someone you know needs assistance with the VA or another federal agency call my office at 972-972-7949 or write a message here https://allred.house.gov/zip-code-lookup?form=/contact/email-me …

It was an honor to help Sgt. Paul Alverson of Garland obtain the medals he earned from his service in the U.S. Army. I am thankful for his service to our great nation and appreciative of his continued dedication to serving the veteran communities of North Texas. pic.twitter.com/PXE8wX7AGd

It's been 200+ days since the House passed the bipartisan Violence Against Women Act, which is essential in the effort to curb domestic violence and sexual assault. I urge the Senate to pass #VAWA to ensure survivors have the resources & support they need. #NationalDayofAction

My office can help North Texans cut red tape and navigate federal agencies. Recently I helped Joan, a retired teacher from Richardson, get the spousal Social Security benefits she was owed. If you need assistance, call my office at 972-972-7949. https://allred.house.gov/casework-success/joan-richardson …

The future of transportation is right here in North Texas! It was great to join @GovAbbott, @DallasMayor, @RepEBJ, @JudgeClayJ and other local leaders as we broke ground on @Uber's Dallas hub. This will create good jobs and help fortify our region as a center for tech investment. pic.twitter.com/8RTjAzwjqG

Open enrollment for 2020 health care plans begins today and is open until December 15.

You can visit  http://healthcare.gov  to explore your options and get more info on how you and your family can #GetCovered. 

If you run into issues, call my office for help at 972-972-7949.
